parts.text: {"word":"sparare","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"撃つ、発射する","english_definition":"to shoot, fire","examples":[{"sentence":"Sparare un colpo.","translation":"一発撃つ。"},{"sentence":"Il cacciatore ha sparato al cervo.","translation":"猟師は鹿を撃った。"},{"sentence":"Non sparare!","translation":"撃たないで！"}],"collocations":["sparare a vista (見つけ次第撃つ)","sparare a salve (空砲を撃つ)","sparare una bugia (嘘をつく)"],"synonyms":["tirare","lanciare","fulminare"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"Late Latin *exparare, from Latin parare (“to prepare”).","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/spaˈra.re/","syllables":"spa-ra-re"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["sparo","spari","spara","spariamo","sparate","sparano"],"past_simple":"sparai","past_participle":"sparato","imperfect":["sparavo","sparavi","sparava","sparavamo","sparavate","sparavano"],"future":["sparerò","sparerai","sparerà","spareremo","sparerete","spareranno"],"subjunctive_present":["spari","spari","spari","spariamo","spariate","sparino"],"conditional_present":["sparerei","spareresti","sparerebbe","spareremmo","sparereste","sparerebbero"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"Sparare means to shoot or fire something, usually a weapon. It can also be used figuratively to mean to say something quickly or without thinking.","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["sparo (noun: shot, firing)","sparatoria (noun: shooting)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"priority":"N/A"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"N/A","frequency_google_ngram":"N/A","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"N/A","text":"N/A"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"I soldati hanno ricevuto l'ordine di sparare.","translation":"兵士たちは撃つように命令された。","type":"example","meaning_category":"shooting"},{"sentence":"Non sparare agli uccelli!","translation":"鳥を撃たないで！","type":"example","meaning_category":"shooting"},{"sentence":"Ha sparato una risposta a bruciapelo.","translation":"彼は即座に返事をした。","type":"example","meaning_category":"figurative"}]}]
